name: Greater Than Sudoku
description:
Play Greater Than Sudoku – a refreshing take on the classic Sudoku by sudoku.com! Solve puzzles, train your brain, and have fun. Install to start now!

It has everything you love about Sudoku, yet adds another exciting layer for those of you seeking challenges. Greater Than Sudoku is perfect for beginners and experts. You can choose a difficulty level that fits your goal best – an easy puzzle to relax and clear your mind or an expert level for a real mental workout.

Get an amazing sudoku experience:

* Sudoku puzzles with the new enhanced mechanics
* Solve thousands of new levels
* Use hints when you’re stuck
* Write notes to keep track of possible numbers. Your notes are automatically updated!
* Take the game with you wherever you go!
* New game from a top developer!

How to play:

* Fill all rows, columns, and 3x3 blocks with numbers exactly like in classic Sudoku.
* Numbers cannot repeat within a single row, column, or 3x3 block.
* Look at the adjacent cells. If there are “greater than” or “less than” symbols, the cells should obey those relations.

For instance, if you see three cells in a row that go like 4 > ? > 6, be sure there’s 5 in the middle – because 5 is greater than 4 but less than 6. Easy!

Challenge your brain with Greater Than Sudoku. Play anywhere, anytime!
